    • handleOutgoingException

      public BaseServerResponseException handleOutgoingException(@Nullable RequestDetails requestDetails, @Nullable ServletRequestDetails servletRequestDetails, @Nonnull Throwable throwable, @Nullable jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, @Nullable jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      HAPI hook to convert errors and exceptions to BaseServerResponseException
      Parameters:
      requestDetails - the details of the request (HAPI)
      servletRequestDetails - further details of the request (HAPI)
      throwable - the exception to process
      request - the details of the request (Servlet API)
      response - the response that will be sent
      Returns:
      an exception of type BaseServerResponseException

    • convertError

      @Nonnull public static BaseServerResponseException convertError(@Nonnull Throwable error)
      Parameters:
      error - an error that could be raised during processing
      Returns:
      a HAPI BaseServerResponseException that will deliver an appropriate response to a user of the FHIR API
